00042 class ObexServerInfo : public Linkable<ObexServerInfo> {
00043 
00044     friend  class ObexServerMngr;
00045 
00046     public:
00048         enum {
00049             NoServerId    =   0,    
00050             FirstServerId =   1,    
00051             DefaultServerId = 254,  
00052             OppImplServerId = 255   
00053         };
00054 
00056         ObexServerInfo();
00057 
00059         virtual ~ObexServerInfo();
00060 
00074         virtual BOOLEAN         Accept(ObexServerVisitor &  v) = 0;
00075 
00076         /*  @brief  Registers a server information record with the server
00077                     manager.
00078 
00079             @param  checker     An ObexServerVisitor which performs an ambiguity
00080                                 check on the record to be registered.
00081                                 If ambiguity is detected, \c Accept(checker) shall
00082                                 return \c 'FALSE'.
00083 
00084             @param  propose_id  Permits specifying a reserved id, like for OPP
00085                                 or the default inbox. When \c 'FirstServerId'
00086                                 is passed, a regular entry is assumed and the
00087                                 id is assigned by \c ObexServerMngr. */
00088         ObexResult  Register(ObexServerVisitor &    checker,
00089                              ObexServerId           propose_id = FirstServerId);
00090 
00092         void        Deregister();
00093 
00094         /*  @brief  Returns the ObexServerId assigned at registration time.
00095 
00096             @return \c ObexServerId assigned by the server manager or
00097                     \c NoServerId when currectly not registered. */
00098         inline  ObexServerId    GetServerId() const;
00099 
00100     private:
00101         ObexServerId            m_server_id;
00102 
00103         inline  void            SetServerId(ObexServerId    server_id);
00104 };
